item.title: Quick Start
item.description: Requirements # Git — latest source release Node.js — latest LTS version or newer Why Node.js? Doks uses npm (included with Node.js) to centralize dependency management, making it easy to update resources, build tooling, plugins, and build scripts. Start a new Doks project # Create a new site, change directories, install dependencies, and start development server. Create a new site # Doks is available as a child theme and a starter theme.
